title: HDFC Bank plans to sell $1.2 billion of loans via rare debt tool
description: HDFC Bank, India’s largest private lender, plans to sell Rs 10,000 crore worth of loan portfolios through pass-through certificates. The move aims to cut exposure to certain sectors and address challenges in raising deposits. The sale will help improve the bank’s credit-deposit ratio.
